page.title: 11CANAL ENVIRONMENT
page.content: The towpath shows both environmental pollution and people beginning to care and try to put some things right.People walk their dogs along a newly widened and surfaced path.There are new steps down from some road bridges and seats.The canal is bordered by stands of Great Willow- herb,Yellow Iris,Branched Bur-reed and Water Dock.We recorded many other flowers including Gipsywort,Skullcap and Cookoo-flower.There are 4 species of fern and a variety of grasses,trees and shrubs.We saw 5 pairs of Mallard and Water-vowl.Fishermen reported catching Roach,Perch,Bream and Gudgeon.It amazed us how fish managed to survive in dirty water with almost no aquatic life except the odd water-snail and microscopic creatures.We were horrified at the amount of litter from the school.
